text: @RandPaul Post #coronavirus you are an even bigger 🐓 smoker than before. I didn't think it was possible. The #rona scrambled your 🧠. Maybe you'll contract it again. That would be a pity. Wear a mask too you selfish piece of 💩. 🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼
